snippet.title: The Next BIG Thing in Monster Taming? | ONI HUNTERS Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Dive into the mystique of Minimon once more with "Oni Hunters"!

🌟 Coming Soon! 
Wishlist now on Steam and stay updated for the grand release!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1051070/Oni_Hunters/#game_area_purchase

📢 Join our community!
🔹 Website: https://onihunters.com
🔹 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/onihunters
🔹 Join the Patreon for exclusive behind the scenes talk: https://patreon.com/onihunters
🔹 Join our Discord for exclusive updates and sneak peeks:https://discord.gg/uf4TwXmvfz

From the hidden dungeons to the bustling squares, Gironia's vast lands are filled with mysteries, monsters, and epic battles waiting to unfold. As the grand Monster Jubilee approaches, every choice you make resonates, shaping the outcome of this legendary event.

🔗 Features Include:
- Deep exploration of the world of Gironia
- Strategic and intense monster battles
- Innovative Monster Fusion System
- Engaging narratives, funny moments, and dark secrets
- A festival filled with intrigue, choices, and branching paths

Are you ready to step into the dance of monsters and unveil the hidden tales of the Monster Jubilee?
